comment.author: 37149688@N08
comment._content: Is the closest holding a fussy cat? In my opinion, they do not have that family resemblance quality. The young lady on our far right does not look similar to any other, although it is hard to discern given some show their profiles. But her eyes most certainly are different. If only some notes were recorded on the back!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/fadedbluejeans] Oh, don't get me started on the "If onlys"! If I could go back in time, I'd make everyone attach full details to every photo ever taken... ;)

I can't make out whether it's a cat (probably not too likely) or something like a muff or furry item of apparel...
